WRITING.TEXT: That would be against the law. That's harassment, and unless he is a tall gentleman he would have to get me lower than his ass to fart in my face which would then be assault. Vaping doesn't Harass anyone nor does it assault anyone. If anyone has a serious problem with it and asks me to stop I would but not for some bullshit reason like "it's obnoxious" Your analogy was wayyy off bro

Obnoxious is subjective bro All I'm saying is I feel good about making this decision and people don't have the right to judge me for it nor do they own outside so I will vape outside in public and inside if it's allowed
Yea I need to grab one too
^this The only thing that matters is the law. If it's legal and allowed in an establishment, fuck other people. This "hobby" is saving my life, and I'm not going to try and hide it from anyone.

WRITING.TEXT: Hahaha yea that's what I thought Haha I thought it was a 134 at first but it was too shiny
What are you pouring it into?

PV's are not smoking cessation devices Some people use them as such but in all reality it's more of a safer alternative for smoking. If you smoked and you don't like it then buy a vape. If you think you could just quit all together then do that. If you want to vape but don't want a mic addiction anymore, buy 0mg nic liquids. TL;DR: vape ahead and don't care so much about what we think lol if you like it that's all that matters

Well, other than the chemical imbalances, certain people build up a tolerance to devastation in their lives because of their situations. So someone from a safe pg environment takes tragedy a lot worse than someone who has had to learn how to accept and move on from tragedy quicker because it has happened to them so often It gets easier over time to deal with things once we learn to do so properly

I think what you're asking is best explained by Johnny depp lol He plays characters that he could realistically play (the ones that are basically normal people) but he also plays characters that are larger than life. He then has to completely dive into a character that has almost nothing in common with himself such as the mad hatter or scissor hands or willy wonks where he has to change a larger portion of himself to play that part than he would to play a realistic character like in finding never land or tourist

Because I am an actor as well and we use the same technique. This song was about his days inside the hotel where he studied for the joker. Studying that intense of a character can't be healthy for your psyche. I have studied some pretty intense characters so I can at least understand a little bit This is just my way to honor him and stand up for his name against the people that say he committed suicide.
Why not? I wrote it to honor his memory and as a way to let people see how truly in pain he was toward the end of his life
It's a little rough, but this is the demo

WRITING.TITLE: What do you guys think? A song I wrote about heath ledgers final days.

WRITING.TEXT: The new coils are still rebuildable

Well it's a matter of how comfortable you are with how harsh it is really I don't know how much juice you have but if it's only a little and you don't vape that often I don't think you should worry about getting addicted in the amount of time it will take to empty those juices
Yea the evic has 510 threads
No problem!

I would suggest staying around the 7-9 watt range with that coil
As long as you don't plan on rebuilding or doing anything with mechs then I wouldn't over think the resistance thing just yet. One step at a time ya know?
I would start at 5 watts and slowly bump it up until you find your sweet spot, if it starts to taste burnt or is too hot for what you like, take it down some
And I wouldn't go starting any addictions you don't have lol 18 isn't that high but it's pretty high for an occasional smoker. That would be why it is so harsh. I would at least go to 6mg if you like the way nicotine feels

Itazte vv 3.0 would be perfect for you And it's innokin as well so it will definitely work with your Iclears
Or I guess you could go with an evic if you don't mind breaking the bank a little

Oh yea that's happened to about 3-4 of those in my house lol It's pretty common The epoxy(sp.) that they use just kinda stops working and it comes out If no wires are hurt you can superglue it back on
Edit: never mind one of the wires is severed If you wanted to you could splice the two pieces back together but I would just say get a new one lol
Thanks man!
